Values: Values should specify a `line type in PyPSA <https://pypsa.readthedocs.io/en/latest/components.html#line-types>`_. Keys should specify the corresponding voltage level (e.g. 220., 300. and 380. kV)
Description: Specifies line types to assume for the different voltage levels of the TAMU Network.
Correction factor for line capacities (`s_nom`) to approximate :math:`N-1` security and reserve capacity for reactive power flows
Global upper limit for the maximum capacity of each extendable line.
Upper limit for the extended capacity of each extendable line.
Correction factor to account for the fact that buses are *not* connected by lines through air-line distance.
Activate the Interface Transmission Limits (ITL) zones limits.
Converts model from DC PF to Transport Model by replacing lines with Links. Link p_nom value uses NARIS network. Must be used with n_clusters == minimum # of Clusters.
